page.title: 05PLAYING THE PIANO
page.content: I said to my dad I would like to play the piano,because I saw Liberace playing the piano at one of his concert's,and I thought that I would be the same. My dad found a piano teacher and I went for my first lesson. Three years later I'm still playing the piano. When I come in from school I go upstairs into my room and practice. At half past six every monday night I go to my lesson,my lesson starts at 7:00 to 7:45. I practice my piano an hour a night. I practice 2 pieces of music, scales, aural, sight reading and theory. You can take 8 grades I have taken and passed the first two. When you first start playing the piano it's a bit boring but as you get more advanced it gets more exciting. When i have passed my exams I would like to be a piano teacher.
